usefulItems: disposable gloves, deep frying pan, paper towels, hob
title: Breaded Cheese-Stuffed Jalapenos

ingredients.content: 12 fresh jalapeño chillies (8-10 cm), charred and peeled
100 g hard goat's cheese, cut in pieces

preparations.content: With disposable gloves make a cut down the length of the jalapeño chillies and gently remove seeds, taking care not to break them. Set aside.
Place goat's cheese in mixing bowl and chop <b>8 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add cream cheese and mix <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Fill jalapeño chillies with cheese mixture. Close up the filled chillies, then set aside. Wash and dry mixing bowl.
<b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place egg whites and salt in mixing bowl then whisk <b>2 min/speed 3.5<b>. Meanwhile, heat oil in a deep frying pan.
Without measuring cup, mix <b>30 sec/speed 3<b>, while adding egg yolks, one by one, through hole in mixing bowl lid. Transfer to a bowl, then dip each filled chilli in the mixture.
Fry chillies in the hot oil until golden brown (approx. 5 minutes). Transfer to paper towels to drain, then serve warm.

hintsAndTricks: A blowtorch can be used to char the jalapeños. Or, carefully char jalapeños over a naked flame on hob, using metal tongs, turning gradually. Once completely charred, place in a sealable food bag to steam. The skin can then be removed more easily.
